Harpie

.NET Blazor C# SQL JavaScript Solidity

Harpie is simple, non-custodial redundancy for your Ethereum tokens.
Harpie is a blockchain startup supported by Georgia Tech CREATE-X, Duke Blockchain, and many more.

Pet the Dog

Unity C#

My first foray into the world of game development, Unity and C#, Pet the Dog is my very first personal project seen to completion. This game was the culmination of over 6 months of hard work and troubleshooting. It features hand drawn art, dynamic instance generation and a loving dog. I created this project as a gift for my SO (spoiler alert: she loved it!).
